snippet.title: Mars Horizon 2: The Search for Life – A chat with the devs 🚀 | Digital Tabletop Fest 2023
snippet.description:
Join Alice, Tess, and John from Mars Horizon 2: The Search for Life as they play Mars Horizon and chat about all the ways the sequel is going to build upon the first game.

Learn more about what Mars Horizon 2: The Search for Life is going to be about, what the “search for life” means, how it will differ from the first Mars Horizon, what’s going to be bigger and better, and listen as the devs explain what they are most excited about.

Tess and John have so much more that they can’t wait to share with you, but for now you can listen to this more-in-depth discussion on what’s already been announced 🚀

Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/MarsHorizon2
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarsHorizon2
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@marshorizongame
Discord: https://discord.gg/aurochdigital
Newsletter: http://eepurl.com/gw5yUv
